title: Reaching Up and Moving Out
speaker: Pastor Lorne
description: Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened and I will give you rest. Exploring what it means to reach up to God and move out in His love.

title: Walking in Faith
speaker: Pastor Lorne
description: Exploring what it means to live a life of faith in every season, reaching to God for our direction.

title: God's Love in Action
speaker: Pastor Lorne
description: Moving out to connect with others in our community and beyond to exemplify His love through acts of kindness.

title: Rest in Him
speaker: Pastor Lorne
description: Finding rest and peace in God's presence even in the midst of life's challenges and busyness.
